description: Kitsune Tails, the platformer styled after beloved classics and steeped in Japanese mythology, shows off a bunch of retro minigames and some pretty powerful modding support that will be available at launch.
title: Kitsune Tails will be a platformer to remember, full of mini-games and powerful modding tools

description: Originally a mobile game that won an Apple design award, Afterplace is an open world adventurous retro game for those who like to get lost. Today it released on PC with full Native Linux support.
title: Apple design award winner Afterplace just released on PC with Linux support

description: Get ready to put together a spaceship again, as the deep space colony sim Stardeus has a really massive update out now and it's looking great. Basically, it's RimWorld on a spaceship and it's cool.
title: Deep space colony sim Stardeus gets a massive overhaul in a new update

description: NVIDIA has released a fresh Beta to get you testing all the latest features and fixes. So here's what's new in the NVIDIA 560.28.03 driver Beta for Linux.
title: NVIDIA 560 Linux driver Beta has Wayland improvements, defaults to open GPU kernel modules

description: Remember DRAG from Orontes Games? A while back they joined up with iRacing and now the game has returned finished as the future off-road racing sim ExoCross.
title: DRAG returns as ExoCross, an offroad racing game with 4CPT vehicle physics

description: ChimeraOS Linux 46 has released today and there's a whole lot of improvements for this handheld and couch-gaming focused Linux distro.
title: ChimeraOS 46 brings major upgrades and enhanced handheld support for GPD, AYANEO, OneXPlayer

description: Take the mining and defense idea from Dome Keeper, stick you in an underwater mech with exploration and twin-stick shooting and you've got Codename: Ocean Keeper.
title: Codename: Ocean Keeper takes Dome Keeper and puts you in an underwater twin-stick mech

description: A rhythm shooter roguelike sounds like a really fun idea, and now you can try it yourself in KILLBEAT which just released a demo with Native Linux support.
title: Check out the new demo for KILLBEAT a rhythm shooter roguelike

description: July 22nd saw a new release of Proton Experimental from Valve, as work continues as always towards the next main release of the Windows compatibility layer for Linux desktop and Steam Deck.
title: Proton Experimental gets fixes for Ubisoft Connect, Once Human, Burnout Paradise Remastered
